apis.name: Plan limits API
apis.description: Administrator access is required to use this API.

apis.name: Get current plan limits
apis.description: List the current limits of a plan on the GitLab instance.

attributes.name: plan_name
attributes.description: Name of the plan to get the limits from. Default: default.

apis.name: Change plan limits
apis.description: Modify the limits of a plan on the GitLab instance.

attributes.name: plan_name
attributes.description: Name of the plan to update.

attributes.name: conan_max_file_size
attributes.description: Maximum Conan package file size in bytes.

attributes.name: generic_packages_max_file_size
attributes.description: Maximum generic package file size in bytes.

attributes.name: helm_max_file_size
attributes.description: Maximum Helm chart file size in bytes.

attributes.name: maven_max_file_size
attributes.description: Maximum Maven package file size in bytes.

attributes.name: npm_max_file_size
attributes.description: Maximum NPM package file size in bytes.

attributes.name: nuget_max_file_size
attributes.description: Maximum NuGet package file size in bytes.

attributes.name: pypi_max_file_size
attributes.description: Maximum PyPI package file size in bytes.

attributes.name: terraform_module_max_file_size
attributes.description: Maximum Terraform Module package file size in bytes.
